ud6.3:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud6.3:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava attano aneke papake akusale dhamme pahine paccavekkhamano nisinno hoti, aneke ca kusale dhamme bhavanaparipurim gate.
ud6.3:2.1: Atha kho bhagava attano aneke papake akusale dhamme pahine viditva aneke ca kusale dhamme bhavanaparipurim gate tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
